version_description:
World Bosses: Team up with all the Eternity Warriors of Udar as you fight to take down new bosses! Compete with other players and guilds to do the most damage you can to earn special prizes!

Trial of Heroes: Compete in a series of challenging boss fights to earn new sigils and ranks!

New Store: Visit the new store where you can get special items and take advantage of special limited time deals!

Revised PVP System: Now when you beat another player in the Arena you will swap rank with them on the leaderboard. Additionally we will be sending out rewards at the end of each day to the highest ranked players!

We have also have made improvements to performance as well as some general bug fixing.

We have also have made improvements to performance as well as some general bug fixing.

Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

All New Kingdom & Boss – Battle your way through an all new zone as you work your way to the final show down with the Demon King himself!
Level Cap Increased to 50 – Level up your characters even higher and start equipping the most powerful gear yet!
New Item Upgrade System – Star magically upgrading your favorite gear to make it even more powerful!
New Event Quests – Complete a series of challenges to earn Valor Points and other great prizes!
New Vanity Items – Equip special new wings to make your character look even more awesome when they are fighting the forces of evil!
Purchasable Bags – Hit up the store to increase your inventory space to store all your new loot in!
General debugging and performance tweaks

General debugging and performance tweaks

All New Kingdom & Boss – Battle your way through an all new zone as you work your way to the final show down with the Demon King himself!

• All New Crusader Class – Equipped with a massive shield and lance, these half demon power houses are ready to lay waste to anyone who would stand against them!
• Christmas is Coming – Soon the town will be all decorated for Christmas! Additionally you will be able to make Christmas offerings for a chance to receive all new holiday gear!
• Christmas Bosses – In honor of the holidays, there will be a special Christmas world boss, and guild boss to fight!
• New Coin and Experience Buff Potions – Maximize your fights by using all new Experience and Coin Buff potions! Now you can greatly increase the amount of coins and experience you earn per battle!
• New Milestone Bosses – Challenge yourself even further with four new milestone bosses!
• Name Change Cards – Don’t like your name? Pick up a Name Change Card at the store now!
• We have also made some improvements to the games overall performance.

Spring Festival World Boss – The Monkey King himself will be coming to Udar to challenge its greatest warriors! Jump in to the fray to earn special rewards!
Spring Festival Guild Bosses – Summon and do battle with the new Silver or Gold Lion boss for a chance to earn special prizes!
All New Gear – In honor of Spring Festival, all new weapons and armor will be available during the holiday by making offerings to the God of War!
Gift Bag Event – During Spring Festival players will be able to complete guild quests to earn special gift bags for themselves and their guildmates!
